ygData.subject: Re: Air and Ground
ygData.msgSnippet: Wildrider continues from the air, and collides with his comrade, landing into his hood. Crunching metal can be heard, but the smoke blocks the scene of crash.

Subject: Re: Air and Ground
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Wildrider continues from the air, and collides with his comrade, landing
into his hood. Crunching metal can be heard, but the smoke blocks the scene
of crash. As the smoke clears, Wildrider can be seen transforming, then
kneels, gripping his head, "Whoa hooo, that was pretty fun" Wildrider says,
cocking his gun, he then whirls around, and pulls his trigger four times,
sending a barrage of 32 laser blasts towars Grounded.
